function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of smart technologies for mass surveillance and enforcement of pandemic protocols","category":"Privacy and Surveillance","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglecting local community adaptations in epidemic contexts","category":"Public Health Impact","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traveling and non-necessary social contacts advised against by health directive.","category":"Public Health Impact","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven population distribution in the building","category":"Social and Economic Impact","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of citizen participation in pandemic response","category":"Public Health Impact","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcrowding and lack of Impact","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in priorities","category":"Societal Impact","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stress, fatigue, poor mental well-being","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of rumors and panic related to 5g technology","category":"Disinformation and Misinformation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differential impact on
